sidebar.description: Subscribe to this pixel to claim territory for your artist.

share.title: üéâ Territory Extended!
share.desc: Save the card below to show off your fandom!

common.q1: Q: The pixel color didn't change after payment.
common.a1: A: It might be a temporary network delay. Please refresh the page (F5). If it's not updated after 5 minutes, send your payment ID to our support.
common.q2: Q: Can I pay with overseas cards (PayPal)?
common.a2: A: Yes, you can make payments from anywhere in the world via PayPal.
common.q3: Q: How is the donation used?
common.a3: A: A portion of the proceeds will be donated to an NGO under the name of the winning fandom. Details will be transparently shared on our SNS and Notice board.
common.q4: Q: How long do I own the pixels?
common.a4: A: Ownership is maintained until the end of the season. You can purchase again when a new season starts.
common.q5: Q: Can I change my nickname?
common.a5: A: Currently, nicknames are tied to your Google login.

intro.headline:
"Donations will be made in the name of the
#1 Fandom with the largest territory"
intro.subline:
FANDOM PIXEL is a global donation project
created by fandoms worldwide.
intro.point1: A portion of pixel sales proceeds is accumulated as donations.
intro.point2:
At the end of each season, a donation is made in the name of the
#1 Fandom that occupied the most territory.
intro.point3: Shine your fandom and share your warm heart!

season_info.title: üì¢ Season Info
season_info.desc1: At the end of the season, ranking and territory are permanently archived in the Hall of Fame.
season_info.desc2: The map resets when a new season starts, but your records remain forever.

process.title: üì¢ Donation Process
process.step1_desc: Donated in the name of the #1 Fandom in market share at season end.
process.step2_desc: A certain percentage of proceeds (excluding fees) is automatically accumulated.
process.step3_desc: Donated to themes selected each season (e.g., Children in Crisis, Environmental Protection) via reputable foundations.
process.step4_desc: Donation receipts and certificates are transparently released via Official SNS within 7 days of completion.
process.step5_desc: News of the #1 Fandom's donation is distributed via Official Twitter (X) and press releases to spread the artist's positive image.

refund.title: üö´ Refund Policy
refund.desc_text: Pixels purchased in this service are digital assets that take effect immediately upon purchase. Therefore, in accordance with relevant laws on consumer protection in e-commerce, withdrawal of subscription or refunds due to simple change of mind after purchase is not possible.
